SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM menu mn left join product pp on mn.first_plate=pp.product_id
left join product ps on mn.second_plate=ps.product_id
left join product po on mn.dessert=po.product_id
#WHERE#

select mn.*, (select string_agg(allergic, ',') from (select 1 as order_allergic, cast (allergic as varchar) from (select distinct unnest (string_to_array(concat(va.id_alergenos, ',',ve.id_alergenos, ',', vi.id_alergenos), ',')) as allergic) v) v2 group by order_allergic ) as id_alergenos, (select string_agg(allergic, ',') from (select 1 as order_allergic, cast (allergic as varchar) from (select distinct unnest (string_to_array(concat(va.photo_alergenos, ',',ve.photo_alergenos, ',', vi.photo_alergenos), ',')) as allergic) v) v2 group by order_allergic ) as photo_alergenos from menu mn left join product_allergic_view va on mn.first_plate = va.id_product left join product_allergic_view ve on mn.second_plate = ve.id_product left join product_allergic_view vi on mn.dessert = vi.id_product #WHERE#
